name: The Next Giant Leap
description:
Take a peek at the Prologue chapter of "The Next Great Leap" with this early build of the game. Here, you'll have a chance to help launch the Orion mission on their way to Mars.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press UP to get into the mini game!

Keep the blue ball INSIDE the middle square until ALL squares light up green!

Once back at the main screen, press SPACEBAR to launch!!
